channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
im trying to run my server but when i click on compile.bat this message comes up 'javoc' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable or program or batch file please press any key to continue.... then when i click runserver this message comes up exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server press any key to continue...
what should i do? and how to i find my port

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @devull devull
item.description:
@devull wrote:

well if you want to run it click the run not compiler anyways here if the info you need this hope this helped

im trying to run my server but when i click on compile.bat this message comes up
‘javoc’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable or program or batch file
please press any key to continue…

press any key to continue…
